price: I u Semudu – kad im bi rečeno: “Uživajte još neko vrijeme!”
arabic: وَفِي ثَمُودَ إِذۡ قِيلَ لَهُمۡ تَمَتَّعُواْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wafī thamūda idh qīla lahum tamattaʿū ḥattā ḥīnin
